full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS MDZAD PA PHYAG NA RDO RJE BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHI YI GUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BGYIS PA'I BABS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS DGE SLONG BI LIG THU DGE SLONG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN, CHEN PO BSKUL BA'I MCHED DU BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA SNYANS GRAGS DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB BA RNAMS KYES SHAL PA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON KYIS MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE BSKOS BSAM RGYA MTSO'I BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
